actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from HUD.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 234 of the National Housing Act to permit shared equity condominium mortgages.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to exempt comortgagors participating in shared equity condominium mortgages from the prohibition against any person owning more than four condominium units the mortgages of which are insured under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 234 of the National Housing Act to permit shared equity condominium mortgages.
